text: The 1980 Winter Olympics, officially known as the XIII Olympic Winter Games, were held in 1980 in Lake Placid, New York, United States. Another possible host city was Vancouver-Garibaldi, British Columbia, Canada. However, they withdrew before the final vote. == References == == Other websites == * IOC page for the 1980 Winter Olympics Olympics Category:1980 in New York (state) Category:Lake Placid, New York Winter Olympics 1980 Winter Olympics 1980
title: 1980 Winter Olympics
